column6: Bad enough Captain America is a hero from the 1940s trapped in today's world...now he's a FUGITIVE trapped in the 30th century! Can the mysterious Korvac figure out a way to get Cap back home, or is the Star-Spangled Avenger forever on the run from a future gone mad!?
column8: | colorist:Brad Anderson | writer:Ben McCool | inker:Terry Pallot | penciller (cover):Craig Rousseau
